ISSUE.TITLE: About java springboot multiple module project
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **such as this project** ![image](https://github.com/harness/drone/assets/57866641/3a11ba8c-1472-4b2b-83f4-0eb4ec187fd3) **I want to deploy only modules with code updates, not the entire project, so I wrote a git command to get the updated module nameï¼Œsuch as "module-1"** ![image](https://github.com/harness/drone/assets/57866641/576d4340-ae72-48e1-8c35-43d7a8578807) **But I cannot pass the entire variable to other steps in the pipeline. Neither the "export" method nor the "environment" method works. How can I pass the name of this module variable to other steps in the pipeline?**
